title: 2000 Today
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Corporation and Stewart Burchmore
brief_description: Share the excitement as we venture to all parts of Australia to welcome in the new millenium. Featuring highlights from spectacular fireworks across Australia, including Sydney Harbour, images from the Dawn Performance on the sails of the Sydney Opera House, the Woodford Fire Festival, and the traditional Aboriginal “Inma” ceremony and “Mimi” spirit stilt dance. The greatest celebration Australia has ever seen.
